DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety efficacy Sauflon Clariti Monthly silicone hydrogel contact lenses handle tint ( Sauflon Pharmaceuticals Limited ) comparison Air Optix Aqua silicone hydrogel lens ( Alcon Inc. ) Subjects use OptiFree Replenish solution ( Alcon Lboratories Inc. ) daily lens maintenance , care storage .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Visibility Tinted Clariti Contact Lens
DOC.detailed_description: I . Study characteristic : The clinical study evaluate clinical performance silicone hydrogel contact lens daily wear , Clariti ( include handle tint ) ( Sauflon Pharmaceuticals Ltd. ) versus predicate device , Air Optix Aqua ( Alcon Inc. ) , term lens performance , physiological response subjective acceptance . Subjects use OptiFRee Replenish solution ( Alcon Laboratories Inc. ) daily lens maintenance , care storage . The key feature follow : 1 . One month duration . 2 . Three investigator site . 3 . Daily wear soft ( hydrophilic ) silicone hydrogel contact lens , replace monthly basis : Clariti Monthly ( handle tint ) Air Optix Aqua . Replenish use care system subject . 4 . A total 38 subject enrol , 38 subject account 76 eye dispensed lens . This group randomize 25 test subject ( 50 eye ) 13 control subject ( 26 eye ) . 5 . Of 25 test subject , 25 ( 100 % ) complete one month use . Of 13 control subject , 12 ( 92.3 % ) complete one month use . 6 . There adverse reaction . II . Study period : The study conduct one month wear . Subjects examine initially , two follow-up visit two week four week respectively . Study visit commence June 26 , 2013 complete September 14 , 2013 .
DOC.criteria: They 18 year age They understand right research subject willing able sign Statement Informed Consent They willing able follow protocol The agree paticipate clinical research duration study They best spectacle correct visual acuity great equal 20/25 ( logMAR 0.1 ) They manifest cylinder less equal 0.75D They successfully wear contact lens within six month start study They fit spherical soft contact lens within power range available They willing wear study lenses minimum four day week , six hour day They active anterior segment ocular disease would normally contraindicate contact lens wear They anterior segment infection , inflammation abnormality They use systemic medication would normally contraindicate contact lens wear They use ocular medication They history herpetic keratitis They systemic disorder would normally contraindicate contact lens wear They infectious disease ( e.g . Hepatitis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) They glaucoma ( high pressure eye ) , cataract surgery history recur abrasion They corneal refractive surgery irregular cornea They corneal distortion result previous hard rigid lens wear keratoconus They pregnant lactate They slit lamp finding serious grade 1 They history anaphylaxis severe allergic reaction They take part contact lens contact lens care product clinical trial research , within two week prior start study
DOC.keyword: visibility tint silicone hydrogel contact lenses daily wear
